scripts.es: npx babel src --out-dir es/src; npx babel lib --out-dir es/lib; npx babel node_modules/@0xcda7a --out-dir es/node_modules/@0xcda7a; npx babel node_modules/@polymer --out-dir es/node_modules/@polymer; npx babel node_modules/lit-html --out-dir es/node_modules/lit-html; npx babel node_modules/redux-thunk --out-dir es/node_modules/redux-thunk; npx babel node_modules/reselect --out-dir es/node_modules/reselect
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run es && npm run bundle && npm run minify && npm run copy && npm run sw
